bug.author: mattsheppard
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:http://deeplearning4j.org/word2vec#just>http://deeplearning4j.org/word2vec#just</denchmark-link> under "Tokenizing the Data" there's an 'if' branch which prints a newline if a token ends in 'ly' or 'ing' - What's the reason for that? Some sort of not quite completed warning logging (if those endings were expected to be removed)? Or is there something I'm missing... Checked in chat, and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/raver119>@raver119</denchmark-link> suggested it was very likely just defunct code which should be removed.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
